thread.section_title: DX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DX | dx.com
thread.title: muhib shah

author: muhib shah
title: muhib shah
text: I booked my parcel through monkey parcel with dx it was booked in night for next morning waited till 3 o'clock phoned them to asked when its going to be collected they said they have nothing on their system about that address but they were quick to withdrew money of my paypal and give their tracking number and they still never had it on their system now i asked for refund lets see what happens its going to take 3to5 days but in withdrawing it took less than a minute third class service
